column5: Here's a funny game online about Santa and his elfs. I thought it was funny watching the exspressions on the elfs faces as you try to run them over with a mega snowball and squesh them all as they try to run from your ball. Cause they were making wise cracks about Santa  SANTASNOWBALL  dsn  Here's some pics of the game.
Can't seem to open the game. Is there another link to it?   Don
Sorry.   still trying to get used to this linking thingy. Try this http://www.addictinggames.com/santassnowball.html  santa snowball
